MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH62 postcode area of Bromborough, Wirral, affecting properties in Croft Avenue and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00AM due to a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:00PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45AM on 4th November 2020
